meanings.sent1: The ball followed an arcing path through the air.
meanings.sent2: The rainbow displayed a beautiful arcing shape in the sky.
meanings.sent3: The arcing trajectory of the frisbee made it look like a flying saucer.
meanings.sent4: Her smile formed an arcing curve that lit up the room.
meanings.sent5: The graceful arcing of the dancer's arm added elegance to the performance.

meanings.definition: The act of forming a curve or arch.
meanings.sent1: The artist's arcing of the brush created a perfect circle on the canvas.
meanings.sent2: The arcing of the bridge's design gave it a unique and artistic look.
meanings.sent3: The arcing of the gymnast's back made her resemble a bow.
meanings.sent4: The arcing of the fountain's water sprayed in all directions.
meanings.sent5: The arcing of the tree branches created a natural canopy overhead.

meanings.definition: To move in a curved path.
meanings.sent1: The skateboarder was arcing smoothly along the halfpipe.
meanings.sent2: The airplane was arcing gracefully through the clouds.
meanings.sent3: The cat was arcing its back in preparation to pounce.
meanings.sent4: The river was arcing around the bend, reflecting the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The car was arcing around the corner with precision and control.
